# tabs

**Instance Property**

An array of tabs that the tab bar displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tabs: [UITab] { get set }
```

## Discussion

To set the tab bar’s content, assign an array of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITab] objects to this property. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/elevating-your-ipad-app-with-a-tab-bar-and-sidebar].

## Assigning tabs

- **setTabs(_:animated:)**
title: tabs
